schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts lightning fast and prevents worse
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, a traffic accident occurred on the country road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, in which a motorcyclist was only slightly injured thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year-old driver wanted to turn around 21.30 clock with her VW coming from Merklingen to the left on the state road 1230 in the direction of Machtolsheim.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: She overlooked the 24-year-old, right-of-way motorcyclist coming from Nellingen.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: In the collision, the hand and foot brake levers fly away
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker still tried to avoid the car, but nevertheless grazed it at the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: As a result of the stripping process, the hand and foot brake levers were torn off on the Suzuki and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Mentally, he steered his motorcycle in the green stiffeners next to the road and let it roll out there without falling.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: Due to the collision with the car, the biker nevertheless suffered an injury on the Beim and had to be treated in a clinic.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Corona-Mass infection: 174 harvest helpers infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: After a corona mass infection on a large vegetable farm in Mamming, Lower Bavaria, almost 500 people are quarantined and are no longer allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service monitors the ban on going out.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 harvest helpers were tested positive for the corona pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during the series examination, as the Dingolfing-Landau district office announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: "In order to avoid further spread, we unfortunately have to take this step to protect the population," explained District Administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Previously, seven employees had already been infected in the company - this was the occasion of the series test.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The farm is a large vegetable farm that grows strawberries, cucumbers, cabbage and beetroot - but the cucumbers are only for pickles.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural municipality with a population of over 3,300 not far from Dingolfing with its large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to citizens to keep calm: "According to our information, it is a closed circle of people".
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected people were separated from uninfected employees, the site is now surrounded by a barrier fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: Greens and SPD gave the state government co-responsibility.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposition groups accused Prime Minister Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of neglecting the control of the accommodation of seasonal workers.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: "This can take bitter revenge if such local infection events spread and regional lockdowns have to be ordered," said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary managing director of the Greens.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD looks very similar:" After the corona outbreak in the Wiesenhof slaughterhouse in mid-May, we have already called for a special control program for farms with harvest helpers, " said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: "From our point of view, the hygiene conditions at the workplace and the living conditions must be strictly controlled.
np-coburg.de.105627.17: The outbreak had come "with an announcement".
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: U-Bahnhof Aidenbachstraße: Dangerous dispute: 19-year-old falls into the trackbed after pushing
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: During a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station, a 19-year-old fell through a pusher and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling-On Friday there was a dispute between two youth groups at the Aidenbachstraße underground station around 4.15 pm.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, who arrived with several stripes.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: According to initial investigations, a Munich (17) pushed a 19-year-old to the ground.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man slipped over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: People from the group of the 17-year-old helped the fallen from the track to climb.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger from an incoming train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: According to the police, there were clashes between the two people again.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year-old initially fled the scene, but his personal details could be determined afterwards.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: Accompanied by his father, he went to the police department 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year-old is being investigated for assault.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer urges Longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: However, Federal Interior Minister Horst Seehofer calls for an extension of the storage period after a media report.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: He wants to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) calls for an extended data retention - instead of the planned ten weeks half a year.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As the" Bild am Sonntag " reports, Seehofer Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) asked in a letter for a quick change in the law.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: Seehofer therefore wants to strengthen the measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He believes it makes sense" to make urgently needed adjustments to the law already now, " the newspaper quotes from the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: A decision of the ECJ is expected.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: But Seehofer wants the changes in advance so that they could be applied immediately after a possible positive judgment, the report continues.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A spokesman for the Ministry of Justice told the newspaper that it could only be meaningfully examined whether there was a need for legal adjustments once the courts had ruled.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer, together with the interior ministers of the Länder, had already spoken out in June in favour of data retention.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club trouble for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Clippers, allegedly left the tournament quarter at Disney World in Orlando/Florida with permission for a funeral.
bild.255016.4: According to US media reports, he visited the strip club "Magic City" in Atlanta in the evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who is said to have admitted the visit, according to ESPN, is back in isloation, being tested daily for Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: His reason for visiting: Chicken Wings.
bild.255016.7: In February last year, "Sweet Lou", as he is called in the NBA, has already expressed his love for these very Wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote: "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta, note. D. R.) have the best wings in town".
bild.255016.9: NBA insider Shams Charania announced Sunday on Twitter that the NBA has ordered Williams to undergo a 10-day quarantine.
bild.255016.10: Thus, the Clippers star missed the first two official games after the test match phase.
bild.255016.11: In Disney World, the NBA wants to end the Corona season.
bild.255016.12: Currently, the best 22 teams are preparing with training games for the season finale, which begins on the night of Friday.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder comments on corona situation after mass infekton
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich-Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) has already announced a test offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference will be live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has shocked authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: Almost 500 harvest helpers from several countries are currently working on the large vegetable farm, and more than a third have been infected with the corona pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is fenced off with a construction fence.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free corona tests to the more than 3,300 residents of the municipality.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the harvest helpers had little contact with the local population, the district office assumes so far that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: "Remorse": confession of the suspected arsonist of Nantes
kurier.at.204625.2: "My client has been cooperative," lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense lawyer added:"He deeply regrets the actions, the confession was a liberation for him".
kurier.at.204625.4: His mandate was "tormented by remorse and deeply affected by the extent of the destruction".
kurier.at.204625.5: If convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a fine of 150,000 euros, according to prosecutors.
kurier.at.204625.6: The Gothic Saint Peter and Paul Cathedral in Nantes was badly damaged in a fire on Saturday night last week.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire had broken out in three places far apart in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory tests confirmed the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The suspect, now in custody, had already been arrested a few hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: He was released after one day.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works as a volunteer for the Diocese of Nantes and was responsible for the closure of the cathedral on the eve of the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: Since there was no sign of a violent intrusion into the church, he quickly came into the field of view of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.1: Discussing the abolition of the 50 + 1 rule
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended thinking about abolishing the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: "German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates a fait accompli, "Grindel told the"Bild am Sonntag".
infranken.de.309597.4: He stressed: "For the clubs that are most likely to be dangerous Bayern and Dortmund, the 50+1 rules do not work anyway: see Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In this respect, one cannot avoid the debate whether it is not necessary to facilitate the involvement of investors in associations that want to break into this phalanx".
infranken.de.309597.6: However, he had doubts whether there was a willingness in the German Football League to allow majority shareholdings, which are prohibited in the Bundesliga by the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.7: "It remains a legal risk to pull investment fences around the business location Bundesliga in a European internal market," said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former head of the DFB sees the danger that"the attempts to ensure more competitive balance in the Bundesliga ultimately only weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but do not lead to more tension in the championship".
infranken.de.309597.9: Even an equal distribution of TV money will not achieve a decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: "FC Bayern has a turnover of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund of 500 million and RB Leipzig of 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: The differences are therefore already immense among the first three clubs alone.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million," explained the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.13: Looking at the past, Grindel feels betrayed.
infranken.de.309597.14: "Unfortunately, there have been people who have noticed this error and poked through to the press instead of addressing it to me," Grindel said of accepting an expensive watch that led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: "This has already occupied me very much from a human point of view."
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift, worth around 11,000 euros, from a Ukrainian official.
infranken.de.309597.17: "I committed a compliance violation, and it was right to take the consequences," Grindel said.
infranken.de.309597.18: "I handled the ominous watch gift completely transparently and innocently.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many in the DFB knew about it".
infranken.de.309597.20: He never "made a secret of the gift," assured the 58-year-old.
infranken.de.309597.21: "This may be called naive, but this form of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption."
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": injured and one dead
faz.79601.2: Protests against police violence in the United States have intensified again due to Donald Trump's use of federal police officers in several cities.
faz.79601.3: On Saturday, there were clashes between protesters and police in various cities.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville and 16 people were arrested in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was killed by gunfire while a demonstration train was just crossing an intersection.
faz.79601.6: Previously, there had been clashes again in Portland during protests against racism and police violence.
faz.79601.7: The security forces, including federal police officers, used tear gas on Saturday night and violently dispersed protesters.
faz.79601.8: Hundreds of protesters, some armed, marched through Louisville, Kentucky, on Saturday demanding that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held accountable.
faz.79601.9: The 26-year-old student was shot during a drug raid in her Louisville apartment in March.
faz.79601.10: The target of the raid was someone else who did not live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: When a member of a group calling itself an armed alliance of Black Americans fired a shot on Saturday, three people were injured.
faz.79601.12: According to NBC, they were taken to the hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them were in mortal danger.
faz.79601.14: The police set up barricades because counter-demonstrators had also formed a white militia.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not meet.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, a person was shot and died during a"black lives matter" demonstration.
faz.79601.17: The police said they took a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: She did not provide further details on the circumstances of the crime.
faz.79601.19: Mayor Steve Adler told the New York Times that he, like many in the city, was "heartbroken and stunned" by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: Protesters also clashed with police in the American metropolis of Seattle on Saturday.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction trucks in front of a youth prison, and the police used stun grenades and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: According to the" Seattle Times", 16 people were arrested for resisting police or assault.
faz.79601.23: In the city of Oakland, California, a courthouse was set on fire.
faz.79601.24: A small group of protesters smashed windows, shot down fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, Oakland Police said late Saturday night (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd demonstrating on a highway.
faz.79601.27: Police said one of the protesters fired a gun and at least one person was taken to hospital with injuries.
faz.79601.28: In addition, windows were smashed in a court there and a fire was set, according to the police.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczy in Bad Kissingen: Historical costumes defy Corona
infranken.de.309607.2: Although the spa town lacked the big buzz, visitors and performers enjoyed the rakoczy flair of the alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organizers: the Rakoczy weekend without Rakoczy Festival.
infranken.de.309607.4: But: Even if the big party mile in the city center was missing, the crowds and program highlights such as Saale burns, Rakoczy Ball or pageant, so many got their money's worth with the Corona-compliant alternative program.
infranken.de.309607.5: "I think we have succeeded in spreading Rakoczy flair," says spa director Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: The guests would have accepted it well.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, one returns to the beginnings of the Rakoczy festival, when only the historical ones were in the focus of the festival.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser has been visiting Bad Kissingen with her husband for more than 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: So also this time in the Corona year.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple made themselves comfortable at the Luitpold Casino, watched the historic strolling and listened to the Cuban live music at the casino restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: "I also find it so pleasant," says Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She does not miss the crowds that otherwise belong to Rakoczy.
infranken.de.309607.14: But she lacks the usual program highlights, especially Saale burns on Friday evening as well as the historical pageant and the closing fireworks on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather would have been great this year, " she says.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczy riding tournament to take place again
infranken.de.309607.18: For the performers of the historical spa guests, the alternative program sometimes meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold, who participates in the pageant in a normal year and can be seen there on the carriage of the Kurgartencafé.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she was walking in the city in costume on Saturdays and Sundays.
infranken.de.309607.21: "This is more strenuous, otherwise we have it easier," she says.
infranken.de.309607.22: The equestrian club had less to do, even if individual riders were traveling in the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: "We very much hope that the equestrian Quadrille will be allowed to take place again next year," says Chairman Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She announced that after a break of several years, a rakoczy riding tournament will also take place in 2021.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 Corona cases at Spanish second division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: The Spanish football second division club CF Fuenlabrada slides deeper and deeper into the crisis due to a corona outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: Since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to a game in the city of A Coruña on July 20, despite the first corona cases, one low blow follows the next.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday, 28 players or team members had tested positive, one was hospitalized, the club said.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Fuenlabrada from the city of the same name south-west of Madrid still had the chance to reach the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now even the relegation to the B group of the Second League threatens.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was canceled at the last moment, the prosecutor's office is investigating a possible offense against public health, the supreme sports authority CSD is considering the forced relegation of the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: Players and other team members are quarantined in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: "Until the sixth day of quarantine, they did not receive a fresh towel and gel," wrote the sports newspaper "AS".
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show how players hung underwear and club clothes to dry in their rooms at the hotel after apparently having to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: The bed linen had not been changed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: Neither is it good nor sufficient, "AS" wrote.
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club management, however, said that they were satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The accusation of wilfully endangering public health was denied by the club's lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: The son of the president of the Spanish Primera Division, Javier Tebas, stressed that the corona rules set up by the Football Association had not been violated, as the news agency Europa Press and the sports newspaper "Marca" reported.
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before departure, there had been four infected people until 19 July, but they had all been isolated and had not travelled with them.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: Right before the flight to A Coruña on Monday, all players and team members had been tested again.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: When the team was already in A Coruña, the corona test was positive for" five or six " other team members.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The match was cancelled 60 minutes before kick-off, Tebas Llanas said.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police have to capture torn horses at Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals were on the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police led her back to her owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: On Sunday morning shortly before 6 a.m., a road user informed two free-running horses on the feeder between the Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld junction and the Theres motorway junction.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were already between the feeder and the village of Dampfach.
mainpost.de.409271.6: Shortly before Dampfach the trust of the horses could be won by the officials, they had a rope carried in the patrol car put down.
azonline.de.86610.1: Professional cyclist Tony Martin: career continuation imaginable
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is considering a continuation of his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt / Main - Seven-time world Time trial champion Tony Martin can certainly imagine continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: "I am currently setting the framework conditions with the team, how and in what form it could continue," said the 35-year-old of the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung".
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by the Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and had considered ending his career after this year before the Corona break.
azonline.de.86610.6: Negotiations with his team are also about the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Or about other problems that would plague him as a family man, Martin said.
azonline.de.86610.8: He used to get up after a fall, and the first thought was: "Quickly back on the bike.
azonline.de.86610.9: Today, as the father of a young daughter, I think: what if".
azonline.de.86610.10: The professional cyclist admitted that there are certainly aspects with which he is increasingly struggling.
azonline.de.86610.11: "But it was good for me to notice from the Corona time what I have in cycling and how much fun it is for me".
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist returns to competition at the Tour de l'ain (5 to 9 August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria's streets at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The beautiful weather attracts bikers to the streets in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, the tour by motorcycle ends fatally.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal-Several, mostly young people died in accidents on Bavaria's roads at the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: An 18-year-old motorcyclist was hit by a car in the opposite lane near Schönthal (Cham district) on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the car got into the opposite lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria, a 22-year-old on his machine collided with a horse-drawn carriage on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to the police, he was going downhill at Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: In a left turn, he crashed into the carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants of the carriage, one man was seriously and one man slightly injured, police said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: In another fatal accident, an 18-year-old died in Bad Kötzting, Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: He had laid down on a road on Sunday night and was rolled over by a 42-year-old motorist.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: According to the police, the 18-year-old wanted to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver could no longer brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: At Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau district) on Saturday, a 57-year-old biker crashed head-on into a car in a right-hand bend despite full braking.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57-year-old driver suffered a shock, the remaining three people in the car were uninjured.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: The safety of motorcyclists was discussed on Saturday by Bavaria's Minister of Transport Kerstin Schreyer (CSU).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans announced for August, Gabor Kovacs, the minister referred to extensive investments such as underride protection on guardrails and the defusing of dangerous curves.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: "For the safety of motorcyclists, we have achieved a lot in recent years," the letter said.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: "The number of motorised two-wheelers killed was reduced by around 28 percent compared to 2011."
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tests with Monaco against Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt / Main (dpa) - For football coach Niko Kovac there is with his new club AS Monaco soon a reunion with Eintracht Frankfurt.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champion will be guest at the Hessen, the former club of the Croatian, on August 1 (6 p.m.).
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga club, it is the first and only test before the second leg in the Europa League against FC Basel (6 August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: Because of the coronavirus pandemic, the encounter will be held without spectators.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: "We are especially looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It is always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet friends," Kovac explained.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: Sporty that is an interesting test, said the 48-year-old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Prior to joining FC Bayern Munich, Kovac had coached Hessen from 2016 to 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB-Pokal.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: "A top-class opponent like Monaco is a good test for us in terms of the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like all Frankfurters, I am looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again," said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50-year-old Austrian had succeeded the Croatian at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, the Frankfurters had lost the round of 16 first leg against Basel in their own stadium with 0:3.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Almost 50 new infections: County of Hof just past the lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: In the Hof district, the number of known new corona infections continued to increase over the weekend: from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and no longer falls into this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: In addition, there is a case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: The Hof area is thus approaching the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 inhabitants in one week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 Killed by monsoon rains in Southeast Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: More than 9 million people are affected by the severe floods in Southeast Asia, mainly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.

handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new demands could not be met, the Economy Ministry in Buenos Aires announced on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: "This would not only be irresponsible, but also unfair," it said in a statement.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: "While 50 percent of children in Argentina live in poverty, we cannot increase the short-term profits of our creditors".
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debt of the second largest economy in South America is no longer sustainable under current conditions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: That is why Argentina is asking its private creditors to waive some of their claims of about 66 billion US dollars (about 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: If no agreement is reached, the country is once again threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: It would be the ninth default in Argentine history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Most recently, lenders have demanded higher interest rates on government bonds and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentine government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is experiencing a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate was more than 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: For the current year, experts expect a decline in economic power by about ten percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: At the end of May, Argentina had failed to pay interest claims of $ 503 million, resulting in a limited default.
pnp.de.390078.2: "It's going great" - this is the conclusion Dr. Stefanie Kramer draws after her first days in the notary's office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything went very quickly: In mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she will succeed Lutz Feller in the Eggenfelden notary office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Just six weeks later, at the beginning of July, the doctor of law started work, the normal daily business has long been running at full speed.
pnp.de.390078.5: "Privately, however, I still have to arrive," she explains in conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course, the short lead time was not enough to completely move the center of life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the native Dingolfing woman.
pnp.de.390078.7: She is currently looking for a suitable apartment or house in the city with her husband, who works as a judge at the regional court in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was still able to apply for parental leave at short notice in order to be able to ensure the care of the two daughters (3½ and 1½ years old).
pnp.de.390078.9: In order not to have to commute from Regensburg every day, she also has an overnight stay with her parents in Dingolfing, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Growing up in the neighboring district, the city of Eggenfelden has of course long been known to her.
pnp.de.390078.11: During visits on site with her family in recent months, she said, "Eggenfelden is a really nice small town."
pnp.de.390078.12: She was all the more pleased that she had made the race for the vacant position in the selection process.
pnp.de.390078.13: Her homeland of Lower Bavaria also plays a central role in Dr. Stefanie Kramer's professional career: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal traineeship and the 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several positions as a notary assessor, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in the Lower Allgäu and Regensburg - during this time she also "incidentally" shouldered the doctorate in labor law - she started her first job as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she took parental leave, followed by the move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then, she has taken over representation services in various notarial offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the job in Eggenfelden was advertised because of the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw the right time for the full professional re-entry, explains the 39-year-old.
pnp.de.390078.18: Dr. Stefanie Kramer has completely taken over the team of her predecessor, who will take over the vacation representation in the notary's office in the future-and immediately has praise for the team of the law firm ready: "It's going super well!"
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on well-established processes makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of the private center of life.
pnp.de.390078.20: She has already made contact with a local institution regarding kindergarten or crèche places.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything works as desired, she hopes to be able to pursue her hobby here soon - and get to know the most beautiful jogging routes of the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans to start the league with a maximum of 15,000 spectators
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund The largest German football stadium in Dortmund will not even be filled to 20 percent at the start of the season in the event of a fan return.
an-online.de.487062.3: "Due to the distance regulation, which is mandatory to comply, we are currently planning with 12.000 to 15.000 spectators", said Borussia Dortmund's managing director Carsten Cramer the"Tagesspiegel".
an-online.de.487062.4: Normally, the arena in the district city holds a little more than 81,000 spectators at Bundesliga matches.
an-online.de.487062.5: In the ghost games of last season caused by the corona pandemic, BVB lost around four million euros per game.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is responsible for marketing, digitization and internationalization at BVB, hopes that in addition to the normal spectator seats, some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality area can be opened again: "It is of course a blow to the office if these revenues completely disappear".
an-online.de.487062.7: In view of the ongoing corona crisis, everyone is currently "well advised to take a stable page length first".
an-online.de.487062.8: "If many companies are not doing well and 6.8 million people are in short-time work in Germany alone, then the need for entertainment is limited," Cramer explained.
an-online.de.487062.9: The Dortmund marketing boss praised the BVB professionals for their partial salary waiver, which should help overcome the crisis: "Of course, the players know that their salary waiver has a different effect than if we put 100 people who work in merchandising on short-time work".
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: early start to life with a few hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Hardly heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body: that was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed exactly 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The boy is one of around 400 premature babies who are cared for annually at the Graz Children's Hospital.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1, 500 grams, a few - like Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael - are extreme lightweights with not even a kilogram of birth weight.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that neither lungs, nor intestines, nor muscles are fully formed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Your skin is sometimes so tender that you could injure the electrodes of an ECG.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that sometimes they wear doll clothes and mini-diapers made especially for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they would not be in voice - "and how," smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: "Even if, of course, they do not scream quite as loudly as big babies".
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes a stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Despite Corona Theater in the classroom: The whiteboard as a stage experienced the 9th classes of the Sankt-Jakobus-Gymnasium in Abtsgmünd shortly before the start of the holiday.

schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was born from the current corona situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was delighted with the enrichment of the lesson.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even if all participants agreed in the end that direct encounters in the theatre and stage space would offer additional stimuli, the theatre also shows the potential for contact in schools.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: "If we continue to improve the technical framework, this could be an interesting addition to the game operation," emphasized director Winfried Tobias.

mz-web.de.376296.1: "Gone with the Wind": film legend Olivia de Havilland is dead
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland is dead.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes in Paris on Sunday at the age of 104, her spokeswoman confirmed to the German Press Agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: De Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern epic "Gone with the Wind" (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, Olivia de Havilland moved to California as a toddler.
mz-web.de.376296.6: Austrian theater man Max Reinhardt discovered the 19-year-old in the role of Hermia from Shakespeare's "Midsummer Night's Dream".
mz-web.de.376296.7: The Warner Brothers film studio signed her for seven years and released her alongside Eroll Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the Heartthrob.
mz-web.de.376296.9: in 1946, she won her first Oscar in the lead role of "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: The film ran in Germany under the title "Mutterherz".
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the award for best actress in William Wyler's "The Heiress" (The Heiress).
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also received a lot of recognition as a neurotic eccentric in "The Dark Mirror" and "The Snake Pit".
mz-web.de.376296.13: Daphne du Maurier proposed her for the main role in the film adaptation of her novel "My Cousin Rachel" in 1952.
mz-web.de.376296.14: The play became a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: With her longtime friend Bette Davis, she starred in"Lullaby for a Corpse."
mz-web.de.376296.16: He married Marcus Goodrich (1946-1953), and they had a son, Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married journalist Pierre Paul Galante and had a daughter Gisèle with him.
mz-web.de.376296.19: However, rumors of an affair with former British Prime Minister Edward Heath were never confirmed.

paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz-Expulsion from AfD confirmed-FDP speaks of " Feigenblatt"
paz-online.de.95211.2: The exclusion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is only a "fig leaf" from the point of view of the FDP and does not change the character of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.3: "The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the far right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is only part of the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD," said FDP interior politician Benjamin Strasser of the dpa news agency in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD had confirmed on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of negotiation the exclusion of Kalbitz, which the federal Executive Board had decided by a majority in May.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is chairman of the AfD group in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: "If the AfD were really concerned with consistently removing right-wing extremists from their party, officials like Björn Höcke and his supporters would have been excluded long ago," said Strasser.
paz-online.de.95211.8: "However, there is no political will for this in the AfD, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party."
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU General Secretary Markus Blume expressed a similar opinion:" The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is now excluded says nothing and does not change anything, "he told the"Welt am Sonntag".
paz-online.de.95211.10: "Rather, it speaks volumes how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist in the middle of the AfD still has."
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will again land below five percent in elections in the future.
paz-online.de.95211.12: "The days of the AfD in the parliaments are numbered".
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the spokesmen of the officially dissolved "wing" around the Thuringian AfD state and faction chairman Björn Höcke; the Constitutional protection classifies the Strönung as "secured right-wing extremist aspiration".
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal executive threw Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: As a reason, he stated that Kalbitz had not indicated a previous membership in the now banned right-wing extremist "Heimattreuen Deutschen Jugend" (HDJ) and among the Republicans when he joined the party.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chairman of the left faction in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, stressed that the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court does not change the character of the AfD: "The wolf has only eaten chalk.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD remains a far-right party, whether with or without Kalbitz".
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the Federal Party nor the right wing will be weakened by this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.20: "The maneuver of the Meuthen troops is transparent.
paz-online.de.95211.21: You want to avoid further observation by the Verfassungsschutz and try to get through under the radar, " said Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: "The AfD does not get rid of the spirits it called.
paz-online.de.95211.23: A expulsion does not change anything, " commented the Brandenburg SPD General Secretary Erik Stohn the decision in the case of Kalbitz.
paz-online.de.95211.24: "Here the AfD-Landesverband and the faction held to this day to their right leader".
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute over Kalbitz's membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: He announced on Saturday that he would now take civil action against the decision of the Federal Arbitration Court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea wind farms deliver a good 21 percent more electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power plants on the German North Sea fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: This is a good 21 percent more than in the same period last year, said the network operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for the transmission of North Sea electricity to the mainland and the transmission through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind turbines on the Baltic Sea, which are not part of Tennet's grid area, have fed in an additional 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: In total, wind power from the North Sea and the Baltic Sea comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to just over 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind harvest at sea thus accounts for almost 19 percent of the total wind power in Germany; this is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms increase generation capacity
paz-online.de.95234.9: In addition to the wind conditions, the increased contribution of offshore wind energy results from higher generation capacities, because new wind farms have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1,270 wind power plants in the North Sea were all running at full power at the same time, they could generate 6.7 gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient for this; according to Tennet, it is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: By 2030, it is expected to increase to 17 gigawatts in the German North Sea.
paz-online.de.95234.13: "In Germany and the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in the expansion of offshore grid connections by then," said Tennet Managing Director Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, even at sea, wind farms are not able to use their capacity, but reach about 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The record day so far this year is January 2, when the North Sea wind farms generated more than six gigawatts of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of electricity, the equivalent of three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: This could supply nearly seven million households with electricity.

dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windbergfest cancelled due to Corona
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windbergfest will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has canceled the three-day festival planned in September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, over 30,000 people had attended this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: "We really did not make this decision easy for ourselves and - aware of how difficult it is economically for those involved - hoped until the last minute," said Lord Mayor Uwe Rumberg (non-party).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: "But ultimately, as organizers, we are responsible for the health of many thousands of people."
dnn-online.de.39567.7: Because if tens of thousands had poured onto the festival grounds and into the marquee, minimum distances, hygiene regulations and contact tracking in accordance with the current corona Protection regulation could not have been complied with.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so strong that not much would have remained of a folk festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: In addition, the organizational and monitoring effort would increase disproportionately many times.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg put off until next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: Then the city of Freital celebrates its 100th anniversary with the Winterbergfest from 7 to 9 May 2021 and the Day of the Saxons from 10 to 12 September 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Dressage Olympic champion Werth in Achleiten not to be beaten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten-Six-time Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage tournament in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51-year-old from Rheinberg came to four victories in four starts at the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning one Grand Prix at the start with Weihegold and Quantaz, she could not be beaten in the Grand Prix Special and in the freestyle on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On the 15-year-old mare Weihegold, Werth clearly prevailed against the Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen in the special on Sunday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: Also in the freestyle on Saturday, the German was clearly ahead of her 34-year-old student Victoria Max-Theurer on Quantaz.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth's winning horse Quantaz belongs to Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The most successful dressage rider in the world is to establish the ten-year-old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: For Quantaz it was the first freestyle ever.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: Already at the first tournament in Achleiten three weeks ago Werth had won all important four tests.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international tournaments is scheduled for August 14-16.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More air traffic controllers in Worms in the future
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Worms continues to take to the skies: The "DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung" is donating a professorship for "Air Traffic Management".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding contract between the university and the DFS has now been signed in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The contract was initially concluded for three years and will start in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: With the professorship, it is possible to start studies not only in the summer semester, but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, the capacities of both the university and the DFS Air Navigation Academy are equally utilized.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: The DFS will advise the university on the establishment and appointment of the professorship.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: Since the summer semester 2019, the first students have been enrolled in the Air Traffic Management program as part of their training as air traffic controllers at the University of Applied Sciences Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: This year, nine students have already started.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: So far, the experiences of the DFS are very positive, the achievements of the students are excellent.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of studies and pilot training makes a significant contribution to further increasing the attractiveness of the pilot profession.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: "In these times, extraction is not easy for us economically.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: However, we firmly expect air traffic to recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: In order to continue fulfilling our legal mandate in the future, we need highly qualified personnel, " says Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, Chairman and CEO of DFS at the signing of the contract.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: "For DFS, the endowed professorship is a future-proof investment that will provide air traffic controllers with a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: We therefore continue the good cooperation with the university and at the same time underpin our attractiveness as an employer".
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This is also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of the University of Applied Sciences Worms: "The Endowed professorship forms an important bridge between science and industry.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we would like to build on the already existing cooperation with DFS Deutsche Flugsicherung as a practical partner for the dual Bachelor's program Air Traffic Management."
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: The trust of German Air Traffic Control is both a motivation and an obligation for Worms University of Applied Sciences to further expand its teaching and research competence in the future fields of aviation.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: With the first endowed professorship for a dual course of study, the university can set very special highlights and innovative focal points for its students in their work for the air traffic controllers of tomorrow.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary at the Ministry of Science, Further Education and Culture, emphasizes: "Worms University of Applied Sciences has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate with its focus on air transport.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: Today's signing of the cooperation agreement strengthens the university's profile".
main-netz.de.61826.1: Rescue helicopter lands on the A 45
main-netz.de.61826.2: The A 45 motorway was completely closed for around 30 minutes on Saturday afternoon in the direction of Aschaffenburg, as the rescue helicopter was on duty after a traffic accident.
main-netz.de.61826.3: A 76-year-old drove a Ford around 12.40 clock in the exit Alzenau-Mitte in the curve straight and landed on the guardrail.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The impact triggered the front airbags, the driver suffered minor injuries to his face and had to be taken to a hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The injuries of the 72-year-old passenger were treated by the emergency doctor and the patient was then flown by rescue helicopter to a hospital.
main-netz.de.61826.6: At present, however, the police assume that there is no danger to life.
main-netz.de.61826.7: The damaged vehicle, which suffered damage of about 2000 euros, had to be towed.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil wants to check other industries after meat industry
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The corona crisis brought the conditions in parts of the meat industry to light again.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.3: Legislation is about to be tightened.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they right - and will they remain so?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Federal Labor Minister Hubertus Heil (SPD) wants to check other industries after the now planned strict regulations against maladministration in the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: "We will look at industry by industry and then take appropriate measures for the respective industry if necessary," Heil told the German Press Agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: Germany's employers are already warning against restricting work contracts in general.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the mass corona outbreak at the meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the Federal Cabinet wants to pass a law of salvation this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses should no longer be allowed to use external personnel for slaughter, cutting and meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: For this purpose, the use of contract and temporary workers should be prohibited there.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employer President Ingo Kramer told the dpa:"Stay away from a general restriction of work contracts and temporary employment, if you do not want to completely choke off the economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: Contracts for work and services are, for example, for wide areas of the craft, construction industry and plant construction necessarily the basis for their value creation at the customer.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: "The misdeeds of individuals cannot destroy such an important instrument".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil assured:"My goal is not to ban work contracts everywhere in the German economy".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: "When an industrial company commissions a craftsman to install a safety system, this is a normal contract for work."
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry considers a ban on work contracts and temporary work in its industry alone to be unconstitutional.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: It is not explainable, why in the portioning and packaging of cheese should apply in the future different labor law than sausage, it says in a statement on the proposed law, as the" Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung " (Saturday) reports.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: A ban would therefore increase the consumer price by 10 to 20 percent per kilo and product.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: According to the results of an audit by the NRW Occupational Safety and Health Administration, Eastern European employees from work contract companies often worked in the industry, sometimes 16 hours a day.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.21: Often they did not have a break.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were withheld for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also noted that the situation with the accommodation of employees was often miserable.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said a relatively sharp law had already come into force for the meat industry in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: However, these were circumvented by" tricky constructions".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.26: "Now we have to clean up fundamentally".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician announced:"In the Occupational Health and Safety Act, which we want to pass in the cabinet at the end of July, are also measures that affect not only the meat industry - for example, higher inspection rates for occupational health and safety or clear criteria for shared accommodation".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft of the dpa includes amendments to the Law on the Protection of Workers ' Rights in the Meat Industry and the Occupational Safety and Health Act.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg's Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) considers more intensive controls necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: "I would like us to be able to carry out even more inspections in many supervisory areas: food inspections, animal welfare, everything possible, including animal transport, "said Nonnemacher on Sunday in the RBB broadcast"Brandenburg aktuell".
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: But more controls would also require more staff positions.
tt.com.148707.1: Three dead in crash of ultralight aircraft in Germany
tt.com.148707.2: Three people have died in the crash of an ultralight aircraft on an apartment building in Wesel in the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia, according to police.
tt.com.148707.4: Two other people were rescued injured in the accident, said a spokesman for the district control center Wesel.

tt.com.148707.7: The house is a one-or two-family house.
tt.com.148707.8: Further details were not disclosed at first.
rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Eviction of Frankfurt's Opernplatz proceed peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: One week after the riots in Frankfurt, the eviction of the Opernplatz on Sunday night was peaceful.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: At last, a few dozen people remained in the square, but left it before the curfew began at 1 am.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had been on duty with numerous officers since the early evening, a larger police force was visible throughout the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: For the first time this weekend, a ban on entering the Opera Square, where riots had occurred a week ago, was in force from midnight.
rundschau-online.de.151934.6: Police officers had been attacked with bottles from the crowd of revelers.
rundschau-online.de.151934.7: According to police reports, at least five officers were injured and several police vehicles were damaged.
rundschau-online.de.151934.8: The night of Saturday had also remained quiet.
hna.de.247362.1: Car overturns: Young woman seriously injured in accident on Bundesstraße 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: In an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme, a 21-year-old suffered serious injuries at around 1.25 pm on Sunday.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to the Klinikum Kassel.
hna.de.247362.4: The fire brigade used thermal imaging cameras to search for possible passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was traveling on the federal highway 83 in the direction of her place of residence Hümme, when her car came off the road for an unexplained reason and hit several times.
hna.de.247362.6: In order to save the injured, the fire brigade had to cut the roof of the car free.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether anyone was still in the vehicle, the adjacent corn field was searched from the turntable ladder with a thermal imaging camera.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone squadron from Warburg, which also works with thermal imaging cameras, had also been ordered for the search for people.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the emergency services did not find anyone among the tall corn plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured woman was taken by ambulance to the Kassel hospital for further care.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 emergency personnel from the fire brigade Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg were on site.
hna.de.247362.12: The federal road was closed for two hours because of the accident.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin-After Cristiano Ronaldo's redeeming goal, record-breaking Juventus secured the Italian championship for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team around the five-time world footballer completed the 36th Scudetto in the club's history with a 2-0 (1-0) on Sunday night in the home game against Sampdoria Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With 83 points, Turin, which competed without the recently long-injured ex-international Sami Khedira, can no longer be displaced from first place two days before the end of the Serie A season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: Inter Milan are seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: Juventus, despite optical superiority, was harmless in the first half, then Ronaldo, after a free-kick variant, hit with the last action.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: The 35-year-old scored a goal from Miralem Pjanic directly from the penalty spot with a low shot (45.+7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: Against the now more attacking guests Ronaldo was also involved in the 2:0, after his shot dusted Federico Bernardeschi (67.).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: This ensured the lackluster but decisive success.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: The penalty shot on the crossbar in the 89th minute should only have really annoyed Ronaldo himself with a view to the scorers ' rating.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: "It's complicated to stay at ball level mentally and physically for 90 minutes.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange, and the momentum changes very easily, " explained coach Maurizio Sarri even after the 1-2 draw at Udinese Calcio on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: Above all, the mental exhaustion of his players is great, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: Because of the defeat, the Turin team had not yet been able to make the championship perfect.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: In the end, Juve's reassuring lead at the top of the table was mainly due to the weakness of their competitors.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: Because in the eleven games before Sunday's game, the Sarri team had managed only five victories.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: Whether Ronaldo will also become the top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: While the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, the former Dortmund Ciro Immobile has 34 goals on his account after his three - pack in the 5:1 (1:1) of the fourth-placed Lazio at Hellas Verona-as many as Robert Lewandowski contributed to the title win of FC Bayern.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: The record in Italy is held by the current Juve professional Gonzalo Higuaín.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentine scored 36 goals for SSC Naples in the 2015/2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: In August, the next title chance awaits the "old lady" of Italian football.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are in the last 16 of the Champions League, but must make up for a 1-0 first leg defeat against Olympique Lyon on 7 August to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: In the next knockout round, Real Madrid or Manchester City would wait as opponents.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: More than 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart-Despite all the threatened penalties and court rulings, motorists continue to accelerate in countless illegal races on the streets of Baden-Württemberg: Last year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal car races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparable figures for the years before, but the speedsters are increasingly making work for the judicial authorities: In 2018, a total of 155 investigations for illegal races were conducted at the public prosecutor's offices between Konstanz and Mannheim, a year later there were already 252 and in the current year until the beginning of June already 151.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: The races were less about organized events, as can be seen from the response of the Ministry of the Interior to a request from the Landtag SPD.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers spontaneously competed against each other or they fled the police - this is also reported as an illegal race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: At the wheel were mainly German men between the ages of 18 and 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: Only in comparatively few cases are the speeding drivers caught and also asked to pay: According to the Interior Ministry, a total of 113 fines have been imposed since 2018 and 15 prison sentences have been pronounced.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: However, there is no evidence that the number of illegal car races is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other motorists reacted more sensitively than before because of the several tragic accidents and processes of past years and indicated more often, said a ministry spokesman.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: The Autobahn 8 is particularly popular with racers. Drivers repeatedly slow down the traffic there in order to gain space and use the free track for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, three months earlier there were even 18 drivers on the A8 near Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: On the A81, the police register even more races than on any other federal highway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: A speed limit is used there to try to slow down the speeders on the particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The usually high-priced and revamped sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers dodge to Germany because of the high penalties for driving too fast and car races in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit must not be reduced to a few routes: "With a general speed limit of 130 kilometers per hour, we would get rid of this problem on highways," says Martin Rivoir, the transport expert of the SPD parliamentary group.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: "The inhibition threshold for speeders would be significantly higher if you were not allowed to travel legally here and there with 200 kilometers per hour and more".
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir thinks less of education or image campaigns: "Anyone who disregards all the rules in such a way and puts not only their own life but also the lives of other road users at risk is hardly achievable with reason".
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger police crackdown
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: However, this is not enough for ADAC: "We assume that speeding drivers will not be deterred by the speed limits," says Holger Bach, Head of the Transport and Environment department at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: It calls for additional and also tougher controls on the affected routes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: Not infrequently, the high-speed showdown becomes more painful and serious: Since January 2019 and until April 2020, three people died in the races nationwide, two of them uninvolved in a night crash in Stuttgart's city center and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two young men are said to have run a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles came off the road, hit a garden wall and remained on its side, the 18-year-old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people were injured in the races of the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: However, in the opinion of Interior Minister Thomas Strobl, tougher penalties are not necessary:" Legislative action to sanction illegal motor vehicle races harder is not seen, " says the Interior Ministry paper.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light of July 23: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack bar
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: A man broke into a snack bar in Rohrdorf (Calw district) on Thursday and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: A witness heard noises in the valley road around 3.40 am and ran towards the snack bar.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: There he noticed a man who served drinks at the refrigerator and then left the snack through a previously smashed entrance door.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled in the direction of the meadows behind the snack.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: According to the police, the burglar also used a cash register and stole cash in the low three-digit range.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and of strong stature.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: In the act, he was wearing a black hoodie, black pants and light shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: Further evidence is taken by the police.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann sprints to victory on final stage at Sibiu Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Professional cyclist Pascal Ackermann won his second victory of the day on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year-old Palatine from the Bora-hansgrohe team prevailed in a mass sprint on the 109-kilometer section with start and finish in Sibiu, after he had already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: It was the season victories three and four for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: In the overall standings, his Austrian teammate Gregor Mühlberger prevailed.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year-old had confidently won the mountain time trial in the morning and thus took the lead in the classification.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders had entered the final stage in the evening.
pnp.de.390142.8: No less than 18 starters had fallen victim to the time limit in the mountain time trial.
pnp.de.390142.9: "I'm really happy to start the new season with a win," Ackermann said after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: "The sprint was really hectic," said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: 300 Meters before the finish, he simply put on his sprint,"and it worked perfectly".
pnp.de.390142.12: In accordance with the rules of the World Association UCI, a corona test was carried out for all race participants and their companions six days before the start of the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, drivers and supervisors were separated from the organization team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators at the start and finish were not allowed.
bild.254818.1: Control center gave instruction for amateur resuscitation
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf-Tragic accident on Sunday afternoon in Düsseldorf-Garath.
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while bathing.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire department, the emergency call was received shortly before 1 p.m.
bild.254818.5: "A control center dispatcher immediately gave instructions for amateur resuscitation," a fire department spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: The arriving rescue workers took over the resuscitation measures a little later.
bild.254818.7: The child, who was in mortal danger, was transported to the university hospital under resuscitation.
bild.254818.9: The police have routinely opened investigations into the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire brigade spokesman: "We assume a tragic accident in the apartment".
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorized tuning meeting-police intervene, 700 vehicles and about 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and at times over 1000 people took part in a "tuning meeting" in the parking lot of a furniture store on Saturday night.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police implemented their announcement to increase control of such events.
infranken.de.309656.4: A big tuning meeting took place on Saturday evening (25 July 2020) in Nuremberg's Südstadt.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the police of Middle Franconia, an increased volume of vehicles in the area of a large parking lot in Ingolstädter Straße was detected by the Nuremberg traffic police around 10.30 pm.
infranken.de.309656.7: As a result, the police there carried out a variety of vehicle checks.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently, the police had announced that they wanted to take more action against so-called autoposers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning meeting in Nuremberg: Only a small part from the " scene"
infranken.de.309656.10: The officers numbered a good 700 vehicles and about 1100 people, the police said.
infranken.de.309656.11: However, only a small part of those present can be attributed to the "autoposer" and tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: Apparently, the majority of the relevant scene complied with the police's appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: On the basis of the vehicles and people present on site, it can be assumed that these were predominantly onlookers.
infranken.de.309656.14: In addition, the majority of those present complied with the applicable infection protection regulations, in particular compliance with the minimum distance and wearing mouth-nose protection.
infranken.de.309656.15: The control measures carried out on site were completed at about 1:00.
infranken.de.309656.16: In total, the officials found such structural changes in 10 vehicles that the operating license was extinguished.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be secured.
infranken.de.309656.19: Illegal car racing did not exist.
infranken.de.309656.20: "The Central Franconian Police Headquarters will continue to keep an eye on what is happening and continue to carry out increased control measures, including in connection with the emergence of onlookers," it said.
infranken.de.309656.21: The News5 agency spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company involved: "They all have beautiful rims, we must not scratch them," says Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special tapes would be used for this.
infranken.de.309656.23: Also because the cars are wider, the company must be careful not to damage them.
infranken.de.309656.24: "The young people should finally get their cars back unharmed".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Figures from the Employment Agency: 900 suspected cases of abuse in short-time work
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin-According to its own statement, the Federal Employment Agency (BA) is investigating around 900 suspected cases of abuse of short-time work allowance.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: "This is extremely low in the case of more than 880,000 companies that have reported short-time work, "said Daniel Terzenbach, Member of the Executive Board responsible for operating business, to the"Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When, at the beginning of the corona crisis, many companies suddenly applied for short-time work, BA had to react quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: Normally, the exam lasts up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: "So much time was not available to us in this hot phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: The more closely we will look at the final accounts.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: I'm sure there's a lot to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are not naive and have a long breath".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Evidence of abuse often comes from the employees or unions concerned.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, use the BA analysis software to detect patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of insolvency in the fall.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: "Will there be significantly more insolvencies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: The assessments differ, but we prepare ourselves for the event of the case and already train our employees in the employment agencies for processing applications for insolvency money".
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The figures are still inconspicuous, said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party in the New Garden dissolved
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam-On Friday evening, about 40 young people celebrated a party in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The collection was dissolved at 8.48 pm by the district drivers of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation announced on PNN request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The youths then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: On Saturday evening, some young people would have played rugby in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The meadow was cleared by Revierfahrer, said SPSG spokesman Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: Again and again there are illegal celebrations in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: In the parks of the foundation, accumulations occur again and again, in which the distance and hygiene rules Covid - 19 Handling Ordinance are not observed.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June there was a celebration with about 300 people in the Park Babelsberg, a week later about 150 people celebrated in the New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without corona ordinance, the parks will be closed at nightfall.
pnn.de.185998.11: According to the park regulations, camping on the meadows is prohibited, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has been complaining for some time that visitors are leaving more and more garbage and destroying protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, meanwhile, illegal park parties have reached another dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide in the district of Neukölln 5000 people celebrated an illegal techno party on the night of Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.15: The event was dissolved by the police.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass tests after Corona outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a corona outbreak in the popular tourist resort of St. Wolfgang in Upper Austria with hundreds of tests.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, as reported by the state authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: More than 100 results were still pending in the evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: According to them, many of the infected young interns are in tourism businesses, but at least one holiday guest was tested positive.

braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: "There are cancellations and cancellations there and there" of bookings, said the head of the Wolfgangsee Tourism Association, Hans Wieser, the dpa.

braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: On Friday, the first infections became public knowledge.
