wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualify for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (reuters) - Manchester United will return to the Champions League after a one-year absence.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured third place in the table on the final day of the Premier League by a 2-0 (0-0) success against direct rivals Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes must now be content with the Europa League, because Chelsea FC still passed by and qualified for the premier league as fourth.
wn.de.700458.5: In the fight against relegation, Aston Villa was allowed to cheer.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead through a penalty from Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City in injury time Jesse Lingard (90.+8) hit the final score.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, opponents of Bayern in the Champions League round of 16, won in parallel with 2:0 (2:0) against Wolverhampton Wanderers thanks to Mason Mount (45.+1) and Olivier Giroud (45.+4).
wn.de.700458.9: "It means a lot to me," said manager Frank Lampard, who is also in his first season as Chelsea coach in the FA Cup final against Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.10: Chelsea's victory against Wolverhampton also benefited Tottenham Hotspur, who still passed Wolves with a meager 1-1 (1-0) at Crystal Palace and will start sixth in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa decided the long-distance duel with Watford and AFC Bournemouth for themselves, but had to tremble at West Ham United for a long time for class preservation.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead of Jack Grealish (84.) equalized Andrei Jarmolenko (85.) immediately.
wn.de.700458.13: The 1:1 (0:0) was enough, however, because Watford lost with 2:3 (1:3) at Arsenal.
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which had three coaches in the season, is relegated after five first division years.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, who could not save themselves by a 3:1 (2:1) at Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: In the end, one point was missing.
wn.de.700458.17: Liverpool, the English champions since the end of June, secured a club record with a 3-1 (1-1) victory at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 Points is the highest the Reds have ever scored in a football season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team narrowly missed out on the points record in English football.
wn.de.700458.20: Manchester City hold the record with 100 points in the 2017/18 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38.), Divock Origi (59.) and Sadio Mané (89.) turned the game on Sunday for Liverpool.
wn.de.700458.22: "It has been an exceptional season for this wonderful club, "said goalscorer van Dijk after the game," which should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: In the end, the Premier League bosses should also be satisfied.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, football operations in England were interrupted from 13 March to 17 June.
wn.de.700458.26: In the meantime, there was even discussion about an early termination or a staging of the remaining games on neutral ground.
wn.de.700458.27: Finally, the season could be played without any special incidents - but as in Germany without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence in demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: The protests in Israel against Netanyahu's government are becoming increasingly violent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.3: During the night there were violent clashes.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police violently attacked participants in a demonstration against the right-wing conservative prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu in Jerusalem on Sunday night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Twelve people have been arrested for participating in riots, police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld said.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: Among other things, the police used water cannons to disperse the rally.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, around 6,000 people had gathered near Netanyahu's official residence on Saturday evening.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They protested against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu's handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protesters beat drums, blew horns and called on Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants of a counter-demonstration supporting Netanyahu were also arrested, the news site "ynet" reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the head of government's private villa in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: A man has been arrested near Tel Aviv on suspicion of spraying pepper spray on roadside protesters from a moving car, according to police.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a protester in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The protester was slightly wounded in the neck.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have been several demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The rallies accompany the corruption trial against the head of government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Most recently, Netanyahu was also criticized for his handling of the corona crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other things, he is accused of hasty loosening and a lack of preparation for a second corona wave.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The corona crisis has severely affected the country's economy.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate recently stood at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections with the coronavirus in Israel recently rose to new record levels.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (NRW) - Van crashes on car - nine injured - Ruhr area- Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen-A rear-end collision on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen claimed nine minor injuries.
bild.254850.3: A motorist was traveling with her two children (3, 5) in the direction of Beckum.
bild.254850.4: The police: "Probably she had braked suddenly because she wanted to turn".
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van driving behind her must have seen this too late.
bild.254850.6: He hit the back of the car.
bild.254850.7: Three passengers in the car and six in the van were slightly injured in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took her to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea seals off border town after Corona suspected case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea has so far seen a "shining success"in its own measures to ward off the coronavirus.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country reports for the first time about a suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Due to a first official corona suspected case in the country, North Korea has completely sealed off a major city for fear of a disaster.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defenses in the past six months, " the malignant virus may have been introduced into the country," the state media reported.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: The state of emergency had been imposed for the region around the border town of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communist leadership raised the highest level of alarm.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: According to North Korea, it had not registered a single infection so far and described its defensive measures as a "shining success".
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: The symptoms of the disease were reportedly found in an "outlier" who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person had left for South Korea three years ago and has now returned across the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: There was initially no confirmation from South Korea of the border crossing within the four-kilometer-wide and largely still mined military buffer zone.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: South Korea's military, however, acknowledged the possibility of an illegal border crossing into North Korea as high, according to reports by the national news agency Yonhap.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: There were investigations on some people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: North Korea reportedly called an emergency meeting of the Politburo of the Workers ' Party chaired by leader Kim Jong Un on Saturday because of the suspected case.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The " dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive catastrophe."
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim had already ordered on Friday, as a preventive measure," to completely block Kaesong and isolate each district and the region from others, " it added.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The person concerned and all people in Kaesong who had been in contact with her had been quarantined.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: Accordingly, the central military commission of the party should investigate the "runaway case", as well as the behavior of the responsible military unit, and, if necessary, impose harsh punishment.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: According to estimates, about 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension before council meeting: City-Ost and noise protection are still up for discussion before the big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: "In addition to environmental issues, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the large-scale project Innenstadtentwicklung-Ost," it says rather casually in the middle section of the municipal press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4.30 pm in the Great Hall of the Congresscentrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: In particular, the upgrading of the eastern city is controversial until the end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majorities for this are narrow, most recently in individual committees, depending on the presence, even negative.
pz-news.de.72354.5: After almost ten years of preparation, project opponent Reinhard Klein criticized an appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project developed by the citizenry and then by the administration and the municipal council fail now as "extra-parliamentary opposition", "clueless", "speculation", "denigration" and "deliberate false statements".
pz-news.de.72354.6: "Everyone thinks they know better," says Klein, who has been a member of the municipal council for a year as the only representative of the Pforzheim citizens ' list.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, after reading the treaties, he is in this position:"I know what I am talking about".
pz-news.de.72354.8: The exit comes the city cheaper, the Technical town Hall is contrary to statements of the city administration after grants, of whose existence Klein is convinced, to renovate for 8,5 million euros.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop very differently than predicted in the city hall and by supporters from the economy.
pz-news.de.72354.10: One day after Klein, the FDP/FW/UB/LED group, which also rejects the project, presented an alternative concept.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It essentially also provides for the renovation of the Technical Town Hall, the keeping of the Schloßberg open, the leasing of the former for administrative areas and a more detailed inner city redesign, ideally with local carriers.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental issues play a central role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues will play a central role.
pz-news.de.72354.14: Among other things, the municipal council will vote on the noise action plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the population of Pforzheim from health-related noise pollution caused by road traffic, including speed reductions in many cases.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, the local transport club Germany welcomes the widespread introduction of 30 km / h. However, the political leaders in the city are not innocent of the fact that this has to happen, because they have contributed to the massive increase in car traffic and thus noise by neglecting the regular bus service with thinned bars and by little commitment to cycling, according to the VCD.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council also votes on the participation of the city of the Energy and Climate Protection Agency Pforzheim/Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: In addition, the agenda includes the accession to the Climate Protection Pact of the State of Baden-Württemberg, the redefinition of parental contributions in the municipal day care facilities and the application for admission to the Smart City funding of the federal government.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must take corona protection measures to heart.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann starts the new season with a lot of delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: With a delay of almost half a year, Tim Zimmermann will start his first season in the ADAC GT Masters on 31 July.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the League of Super Sports cars can start regular operation, the first test drives were now on.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, it was all about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: For a long time, the corona crisis prevented Tim Zimmermann from taking his first official ride in the new Lamborghini Huracan from Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: Under special hygiene conditions, this was now possible.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old Langenargener turned his first laps at the Lausitzring and was able to get used to his debut in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: "There are already a few things that are different from the Porsche from the previous season," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: "With the ABS, for example, you have to go into the corners differently.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a lot of fun".
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst, with whom he will share his orange sports car in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: Despite being only 25 years old, the Dutchman is already experienced in GT sports and was able to help his new team-mate in many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: "I'm not a beginner in motorsport, but every new series brings new challenges," says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: "Steijn and I get along brilliantly and we have made enormous progress from session to session at the Lausitzring."
schwaebische.de.113555.15: Right there - at the Lausitzring-the GT Masters will also host its first race.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: From 31 July, the 33 supercars will race through Lusatia.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 newcomers to the series, knows the route.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: in 2015 he was a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: "It worked quickly and I didn't have to get used to the track much," says Zimmermann, who starts for the Friedrichshafen racing community Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: "The Lausitzring has many fast passages that you have to hit optimally to be fast".
schwaebische.de.113555.21: How fast Zimmermann really is, it turns out in two weeks.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: "Of course, the teams play poker a little during the tests," he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: "In the end, however, we are very satisfied and look forward to the first weekend at the Lausitzring".
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the start of a crowded calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: There are seven races until the beginning of November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: The current state is that no spectators will be admitted - but there is a prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August at the Nürburgring, former Formula 1 driver Niko Hülkenberg will take the GT steering wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: UK Transport minister caught cold by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The British government's decision to quarantine Spanish holidaymakers for two weeks after their return has caught the country's transport minister cold, according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: According to this, Grant Shapps is currently on vacation in Spain, while his colleagues at home decided on Saturday the measure.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the rising corona numbers in Spain, the Cabinet in London removed the country from the list of countries from which entry without quarantine restrictions is possible.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new rule will apply from today, Sunday, so Shapps will also have to be quarantined after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for returnees.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the rule applies to those who are just on holiday on the deadline, only from Saturday, August 1, and was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: By the way, Spain in Austria is still considered one of the "safe countries" for which quarantine in Austria is not required.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: "Many ministers may have known in advance that there is a possibility that a quarantine will be imposed on holidaymakers in Spain," commented Labour MP Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: "But apparently no one bothered to tell Grant Shapps".
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Almost a month after the end of the corona emergency in Spain and the expiration of the strict curfew, the infection numbers in the country are rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists mainly blame the nightlife for the renewed spread.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the favorite holiday destinations of the British.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government is currently advising against unnecessary travel to the Spanish mainland, excluding the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular with British holidaymakers.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: So far, more than 272, 000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28, 000 deaths have been recorded in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic Weapons for Warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that warships will be equipped with state-of-the-art hypersonic weapons for the Day of the Navy in his country.
mz-web.de.376126.3: With these weapons, unique in the world, the combat capabilities of the Russian naval Forces would be expanded, Putin said on Sunday in St. Petersburg at the Central Naval Parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: The Ministry of Defense also informed the Interfax agency about successful tests of the Zircon hypersonic missile built for the Navy.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a multiple of the speed of sound of around 343 meters per second.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are considered weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.7: Underwater tropedeo continues to be built
mz-web.de.376126.8: Construction will continue on the nuclear-equipped underwater torpedo Poseidon, it said.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned sea drone is planned to destroy coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The president, who himself also went on a military boat, said that this year alone, 40 new ships would be put into service with the individual fleet associations of the largest country on Earth.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has such a large coastal area as no other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: For 300 years, the Navy has reliably protected Russia, Putin said at the day celebrated by sailors nationwide.
mz-web.de.376126.13: Also in many other Russian coastal resorts, the naval forces celebrated the Day of the Navy with parades.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting alongside Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated strength at a weapons show in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: In a video released by the Ministry of Defense, not only warships, including a submarine, but also attack helicopters and jets, could be seen.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane "Hanna" reaches Texas: help made more difficult because of Corona
tt.com.149061.2: Washington-The first hurricane of this year's season across the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening floods, strong winds and heavy rains are now threatening parts of the US state, the National Hurricane Center told the US Climate Agency NOAA on Sunday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for numerous districts.
tt.com.149061.5: The corona pandemic rampant in Texas complicates the work of aid workers, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: "Every hurricane is a tremendous challenge, "Abbott said, according to the Houston Chronicle.
tt.com.149061.8: Referring to the hurricane in Texas, he added, "This challenge is complicated and exacerbated when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most affected by Covid-19 in the state".
tt.com.149061.9: According to the Johns Hopkins University, around 5000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the corona pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called for caution for people who had to leave their homes.
tt.com.149061.11: They should not disregard practices "that we have become accustomed to," such as wearing masks, the governor said, according to CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It was important that everyone kept their distance.
tt.com.149061.13: Therefore, hotel rooms have been provided in some places.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, corona should be tested in emergency shelters.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage had initially only been reported from the coastal town of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 kilometers per hour, "Hanna" hit the island of Padre Island just off the Texas coast, according to authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm had previously been upgraded to the lowest level one hurricane.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning had been issued and later withdrawn.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected a slowdown, while" Hanna " moved further inland and headed for northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, Hurricane "Douglas" was heading for Hawaii on Sunday night with wind speeds of around 150 kilometers per hour.
tt.com.149061.23: However, the hurricane center expected it to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: According to the forecast, it should be near Hawaii's largest islands on Sunday (local time)-then just below the hurricane threshold as a storm.
tt.com.149061.25: Across the Atlantic, NOAA expected an above-average hurricane season this year, according to a May forecast.
tt.com.149061.26: From June to the end of November, up to ten hurricanes are expected, of which up to six could become very strong hurricanes, the authority had explained.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes per year over the Atlantic, three of which develop into storms of great strength.
tt.com.149061.28: In view of available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and the Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent, that of a below-average even only ten percent, it was said at the time.
tt.com.149061.29: US President Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his government is closely monitoring the storms and is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals disallowed: video assistant "punished" Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo's Filip Djuricic was denied two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples-Four goals scored, four goals conceded: Sassuolo Calcio experienced a pitch-black evening at 0:2 (0:1) at SSC Naples in the Italian football league Serie A - and was really angry with the referee's video assistant.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: "A festival of not given goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: The VAR has never been so hard on a team, "commented the"Corriere dello Sport".
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Hosts Napoli had taken the lead through a goal from outside defender Elseid Hisaj in the 8th minute, in the 32nd minute Filip Djuricic first cheered the equalizer.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The Video Assistant Referee (VAR) took the hit back because of an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later Djuricic shot the ball into the net again - again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The referee team also took back the goals of attacker Francesco Caputo (50.) and Domenico Berardi (61.) after notice of the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: In stoppage time Allan made the 2-0 final score for Naples and the bitter evening for Sassuolo perfect.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: "The VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a speed trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology sets records," writes the "Gazzetta dello Sport".
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - The start of the hot preparation phase for the Champions League began for double winner FC Bayern with a setback.
wn.de.700404.3: After a short vacation and a few days of training, Hansi Flick recovered "reasonably well" and after the first team training has to think about how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury of world champion Benjamin Pavard.

wn.de.700404.6: How long the unrestricted regular player has to pause in the fight for the title is open.
wn.de.700404.7: A bet in the round of 16 second leg against Chelsea on 8 August should be difficult, the 24-year-old can hope for the final tournament starting on 12 August in Lisbon.
wn.de.700404.8: The Bavarians do not want to be stopped by the mishap from training on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: In his personal triple formula, Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on the way to Portugal's capital.
wn.de.700404.10: His victory-hungry title collectors should show quality, intensity and concentration in the ideally following 28 days until the King's Class final on 23 August.

salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to choose its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since it is not possible to race on the required number of continents, the FIA has to improvise in order to award the world championship titles.
salzburg.com.306641.3: However, all American races were cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: Race calendar gets more and more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The racing calendar of the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: In addition to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far, three more race tracks were added during the week.
salzburg.com.306641.7: In October, it will be driven at the Nürburgring in Germany and in Portimão, Portugal.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On the first of November, Lewis Hamilton and Co. will fight for World Championship points on the traditional Italian circuit in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: This means that the 2020 race calendar currently comprises 13 races.
salzburg.com.306641.10: "We are pleased to continue to make great progress in completing our plans for the 2020 season," said Formula one boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: A total of 15 to 18 races in the premier class of motorsport are to be completed in this extraordinary season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Formula 1 wants to conclude its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar is to be fixed and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: According to media reports, performances in Vietnam and Malaysia could take place at the end of November before the officially planned races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Regulations require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: The regulations of Formula 1 require at least races on three continents for the awarding of the World Championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, only two continents are driven, there should be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: With the help of a special rule, the FIA wants to award the titles citing "exceptional circumstances" due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the impending corona crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: A return to the continent later this year is not an issue.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 will not be a guest in America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation met with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: Due to the tense corona situation, the races will not take place in Canada, the USA, Mexico and Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.24: "We look forward to being back with them next season," Carey explained.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races met with criticism, especially in Brazil:" The cancellation came as no surprise to us, but we cannot accept the reasons for it, " said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: The infection numbers in the São Paulo area are significantly lower than in other regions of Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: In addition, the concerns of some teams not wanting to race in Brazil would not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: One is prepared for the required security measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Evil eye against Donald Trump went around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her meeting with US President Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert's well-known Latenight show via video link and revealed in an interview what she had in mind when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Klimaatkivistin Greta Thunberg was a guest on a popular US Latenight show via video link.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she told about her struggle against the powerful of the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also spoke about her famous "evil eye" during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City-Over the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has drawn attention to herself with her tireless commitment to the "Fridays For Future"movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now she spoke on a well-known Latenight show about her plans in the future, as well as her meeting with US President Donald Trump at the UN climate summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Latenight host Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year-old Thunberg to your show on Tuesday and conducted a longer interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: She spoke not only about her fight against climate change, but also about her conflict with the world's powerful.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: "There are some things that surprised me," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: "How far people go to steer the focus away from the climate crisis," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: "Everything from organized hate campaigns to threats just because a group of children takes to the streets," she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: Heads of state and leaders who mock her on social media, or even try to silence her, find her "funny", as the reactions show her, "since they have no other answer to it".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: It became particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was asked about a well-known scene in which she cast a bitter look behind US President Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the 2019 UN Climate Summit in New York, for which the actvist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive gaze was caught by the cameras and has since been seen by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: The short clip turned into a GIF, that is, an animated image, which ultimately became one of the most used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what did the 17-year-old think about the US president at that moment?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: To Stephen Colbert's relatively open question, she answered only briefly and dryly:"To be honest, I don't think that needs any further explanation".
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert probably did not expect the quick-witted answer and briefly disappeared from the picture laughing.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: With their " How dare you?"- Speech on the principles of climate protection, she was remembered by many at the climate conference.

mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac Co-Founder Peter Green Dies
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a rollercoaster ride: after a rapid ascent with Fleetwood Mac, it went steeply downhill and then slowly uphill again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now the blues rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Brilliant guitarist, drug junkie, cult follower: the co-founder of the band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, family members said in an official statement on Saturday, another statement would be announced for the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Top musicians such as Peter Frampton recognized Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: In an emotional response, Mick Fleetwood spoke of a" monumental loss " for all former and current members of the band Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green had founded the now legendary band in London in 1967, his dreamy instrumental hit "Albatross"is still unforgotten today.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The life of the musician ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") resembled a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: With Fleetwood Mac Green experienced a rapid rise - the band celebrated their greatest successes but then without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: Among other things, there was a dispute because Green wanted to donate all the profits of the group to charity.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in wide robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a role.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Green left the band in 1970, just three years after the band's formation.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, as biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time, Green was treated in psychiatry.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: During much of the 1970s, the musician disappeared from the scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: He is said to have lived on the streets for a time, worked as a cemetery gardener and spent time in an Israeli kibbutz.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946 to a Jewish working-class family in the London borough of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: From a young age he was enthusiastic about US blues musicians such as B. B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: At the age of eleven he learned the first guitar handles.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15, the teenager began to play the guitar professionally, and five years later got the chance to perform on stage as the lead guitarist for the instrumental band Peter B's Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later, he was hired as a replacement for his idol Eric Clapton with the Bluesbreakers.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the middle of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac in the summer of 1967 together with his Bluesbreakers colleagues Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song "Albatross", composed by Green, gave the group their first number one hit in the winter of 1968/69 and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But the rapid rise soon showed its dark sides: Green could not cope with the media hype, his experiments with the drug LSD became more and more extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: He later commented on life between music and addiction in an interview: "The worst thing that happened to me in life is the drugs - the best thing was to land a number 1 hit".
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, Green achieved a surprising success in 1979 with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Fleetwood Mac, meanwhile, swam without him in a new formation on a wave of success.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Her 1977 album "Rumours" sold more than 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various small solo successes, Green did not make a major comeback until 1996, when he started again with a group of friendly musicians.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: The British "Daily Telegraph" spoke at the time of a rock star returned to Earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free from Drugs, Green released several albums with the Peter Green Splinter Group until the band disbanded in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts, he was already a blues legend during his lifetime-and with his soft sound one of the most influential guitarists of the past decades.
